name: Disappointing Expectations
description:
Charlie (Lead Programmer/Level Designer), Luke (Lead Artist/Programmer) myself Gareth (Lead Designer/Story Writer).

This is a short comedy apocalypse game where you must escape from your bunker to go into the wasteland thinking about your favourite apocalypse RPG game. But getting out won't be so easy due to some obstacles getting in the way.

This game was a part of my 3 Day Game Jam where I had been placed into a group and we develop a game based on a theme. This theme was Disappointing Apocolypse and the story & ending to this game makes the theme work.

WASD - movement keys

Spacebar - Jump

E - to interact with buttons

R - restart

Esc - Quit
